description: MADRID - The International Court of Justice (ICJ), the main UN body for resolving disputes between states, has declared that Israel's ongoing presence in the occupied Palestinian territories is illegal and must end "as soon as possible."
title: ICJ recognizes the colonial nature of the Zionist entity

description: TEHRAN- President Joe Biden is expected to meet Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in the White House amid global outcry over Washington’s unwavering military support for the Tel Aviv regime’s genocidal war on Gaza.
title: Behind Bibi's US trip: The butcher of Gaza wants a sharper knife

description: TEHRAN- The Yemeni armed forces have pledged greater and more powerful operations against the Israeli occupation following the deadly Israeli aggression at Yemen’s Hodeidah.
title: Ansarullah strike Eilat after Israeli aggression on Hodeidah

description: Another Palestinian journalist was killed Sunday in an Israeli attack on the central Gaza Strip, bringing the death toll to 162 since October 7, Anadolu Agency reported.
title: Israel kills another journalist in Gaza

description: The European Union’s foreign policy chief said the International Court of Justice’s advisory opinion that Israel’s presence in the occupied Palestinian territory is unlawful and needs to end is “largely consistent with EU positions”.
title: Borrell commends ICJ’s advisory opinion on Palestine

description: Several European nations have reintroduced or expanded compulsory military service amid Russia’s war against Ukraine.
title: Europe turns to conscription amid Russia-Ukraine war

description: The Palestinian Prisoners Club reported on Sunday that Israeli forces arrested at least 26 Palestinians over the past two days across the occupied West Bank.
title: Israeli forces make more arrests in West Bank

description: Russia said Sunday that it scrambled fighter jets to prevent two US strategic bomber planes from crossing its border over the Barents Sea in the Arctic.
title: Russia says it intercepted US fighter jets over the Arctic

description: TEHRAN - In a conversation with Davood Aghaei, an expert on international issues, Donya-e-Eqtesad discussed the importance of Iran's membership in the Shanghai Cooperation Organization and said: For years, our country has been facing serious obstacles and problems in the field of international economic and commercial cooperation.
title: FATF, Iran's main obstacle in Shanghai

description: TEHRAN- The chief commander of Iran's Army's Air Defense Force visited radar and air defense sites at the Abdanan industrial complex.
title: Iranian Army Aviation goes high-tech: Iranian Commander

description: TEHRAN- Shehbaz Sharif, the prime minister of Pakistan, will participate in the inauguration ceremony of Iran’s newly elected president.
title: Pakistan PM to attend Iran's new President's inauguration

description: Tehran- In a recent meeting with an Iranian media delegation that visited Qinghai Province, China, Cong Peiwu, the Chinese Ambassador to Iran, made several significant remarks.
title: Tehran-Beijing ties on winning streak: envoy

description: TEHRAN – Iran's Ambassador to Belarus, Alireza Saane’i, has expressed optimism about the future of relations between the two countries, highlighting the shared challenges presented by international sanctions and the opportunities for deeper cooperation.
title: Sanctions have not hindered Iran-Belarus ties: envoy

description: TEHRAN- The ex-presidential election candidate and former head of Iran's Inspectorate Organization has been announced as the first pick for the Ministry of Interior in the fourteenth government.
title: Pour Mohammadi floated as potential interior minister

description: TEHRAN – Iran's Foreign Ministry spokesman Nasser Kanaani has strongly condemned the Israeli regime's deadly attacks on western Yemen, warning that such aggression risks exacerbating the already dire situation in the region.
title: Iran condemns Israeli strikes on Yemen, warns of escalation

description: TEHRAN- “I am Chinese and proud of my country, but I cannot deny that China’s ability to play a role in international society is less than not only the United States but even Iran.”
title: Iran needs to understand China directly

description: TEHRAN-The Persian translation of the book “Civilized to Death: The Price of Progress” written by Christopher Ryan has been released in the Iranian book market.
title: “Civilized to Death: The Price of Progress” published in Persian

description: TEHRAN- A Persian translation of British author Lisa Jewell’s “None of This Is True” has recently been published by Amut Publications in Tehran.
title: “None of This Is True” at Iranian bookstores

description: TEHRAN- An exhibition of painting by renowned artist Ali Bahreini will be inaugurated in Tehran’s Niavaran Cultural Center on Tuesday, showcasing a poignant depiction of the events leading up to Ashura.
title: Ashura-themed painting exhibition to open in Tehran

description: TEHRAN – A senior political advisor to Leader of Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei has lauded the recent Yemeni drone strike deep within Israeli-occupied territories, calling the longstanding threats from the Israeli regime against Iran and Yemen a mere "mirage."
title: Senior Iranian advisor praises Yemen’s anti-Israel op., dismisses Israeli threats

description: TEHRAN – The speaker of the Iranian Parliament, Mohammad Baqer Qalibaf, has pledged full support from Iranian lawmakers to assist President-elect Masoud Pezeshkian and his upcoming administration in effectively governing the nation.
title: Speaker of Iranian parliament vows full support for new president

description: TEHRAN – In a meeting with the speaker and members of the Twelfth Iranian Parliament on Sunday, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution asserted Gaza as the Islamic world’s number one issue.
title: Gaza still Islamic world’s number one issue: Leader

description: In a development that sends the contest into unchartered territory, the US president announced that he will no longer be seeking a second term.
title: Biden pulls out of the presidential race

description: Let’s begin with the latest ruling from the United Nation’s highest court, the International Court of Justice (ICJ): Israel’s occupation of Palestinian territories is illegal. The ICJ rendered its all-encompassing judgment on Israel’s occupation of the West Bank, East Jerusalem and its settlements, calling for an end to Israel’s presence there. Under United Nations charter, the opinion, while not binding, carries legal weight.
title: Is America for or against the international rule of law?

description: TEHRAN – Iranian taekwondo athlete Mobina Nematzadeh is determined to win a gold medal in the 2024 Olympic Games.
title: Taekwondo athlete Nematzadeh aims to win gold at 2024 Olympics

description: ISLAMABAD- For the past nine months, the usurping Zionist regime of Israel has been engaged in the genocide of Palestinians in the Gaza Strip of Palestine.
title: Will the U.S. and Israel impose war on Lebanon?

description: TEHRAN-Two Iranian filmmakers will serve as jurors in film festivals in Canada and Italy in the coming months.
title: Two Iranian filmmakers to serve as jurors in Canadian, Italian festivals

description: TEHRAN-The celebrated Iranian conductor Ali Rahbari held a concert at the world-famous Mariinsky Opera and Concert Hall in St. Petersburg, Russia, on July 18.
title: Ali Rahbari conducts Mariinsky Orchestra at “Transfigured Night” concert in St. Petersburg

description: TEHRAN- The Palestine Museum of Contemporary Art in Tehran will be hosting a cartoon exhibition on the massacre committed by the Zionist regime in Gaza and Palestine.
title: Tehran exhibition to bring attention to Israeli war crimes in Gaza

description: TEHRAN - Starting in early September, Flydubai will introduce direct flights between Dubai and Kerman, significantly enhancing the Iranian province’s connectivity worldwide, a local official said.
title: Kerman-Dubai flights to take off from early September

description: TEHRAN – Some agritourism farms in Golestan province have received operating permits, marking a significant step in boosting sustainable tourism and creating job opportunities, a local official said on Sunday.
title: Agritourism farms get green light in Golestan

description: TEHRAN - Specialized museums dedicated to the intangible heritage of Muharram rituals are set to be established in Kashan, central Iran, according to an official in charge of museums.
title: Kashan to establish specialized museums for Muharram rituals

description: TEHRAN – Digging archaeological trenches around Genil hill in Harsin county of Kermanshah province, have led to the identification of a site from the Neolithic period.
title: Discovery of a Neolithic site in Kermanshah

description: As Iran stands on the cusp of forming its new cabinet, journalists and experts are urgently calling for the selection of a highly capable and adept minister to lead the Ministry of Cultural Heritage, Tourism, and Handicrafts.
title: Opportunities and challenges awaiting new minister of tourism and cultural heritage

description: TEHRAN- Iran-China freight train was relaunched at Aprin dry port, in Eslamshahr county, southwest of Tehran city, on Sunday.
title: ‘Iran-China rail route a safe gateway to Europe for China’

description: On Saturday, people and officials in the northwestern city of Hashtroud held a ceremony to celebrate the wheat harvest and honor exemplary farmers.
title: Wheat harvest celebrated in Hashtroud

description: TEHRAN –The Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) will host the International Congress on Relief and Rescue, Health, and Mass Gatherings in Arbaeen in Tehran from August 1-2.
title: Tehran to hold Intl. Congress on Relief, Rescue, Health in Arbaeen

description: TEHRAN –The first national conference on artificial intelligence (AI) in education and learning is scheduled to be held in Tehran on October 9.
title: National conference on AI in education, learning slated for October

description: TEHRAN – A delegation of Iranian knowledge-based firms will attend the 21st edition of the Health Asia which will take place in Karachi, Pakistan, from October 17 to 19.
title: Health Asia 2024 to host Iranian knowledge-based delegation

description: TEHRAN – Iran anti-narcotics police chief, Iraj Kakavand, has called regional cooperation essential in tackling drug trafficking.
title: Iran highlights regional co-op in fighting drug trafficking

description: TEHRAN- As announced by the director general of the Iranian Ministry of Agriculture’s Office of Quality Improvement, Processing, and Aquatic Market, the value of Iran’s fish export stood at $53.3 million during the first quarter of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-June 20).
title: Iran’s quarterly fish export surpasses $53m

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s cooperative sector exported commodities worth over $3.8 million over the past three years, registering a 24 percent increase.
title: Export by cooperatives exceeds $3.8m in 3 years

description: TEHRAN – Members of the Tehran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines and Agriculture (TCCIMA) Transportation Committee have explored a new model of private-public cooperation in transportation projects.
title: TCCIMA explores ways to boost private sector role in transport sector

description: TEHRAN - The board of representatives of the Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines and Agriculture (ICCIMA) held their 14th meeting in the new tenure on Sunday during which the priorities of the Iranian economy and the challenges in the way of achieving economic goals were discussed.
title: Iran’s economic priorities discussed at ICCIMA board meeting

description: TEHRAN – The head of Iran Feed Industry Association says every year over 11 million tons of livestock feed is produced by 886 production units in the country, IRNA reported.
title: Over 11m tons of livestock feed produced in a year

description: TEHRAN – Esteghlal football team goalkeeper Hossein Hosseini has been reportedly linked with a move to Persepolis.
title: Esteghlal goalkeeper Hosseini linked with Persepolis
